group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study has been performed in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki and has been approved by the Ethics Committee of Hadassah Medical Center #0447–19-HMO. Informed consent to participate in the study has been obtained from participants.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: N/A: This MS does not include identifying details, images, or videos relating to an individual person.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.
